title: The $79 Trillion Heist
description:
We’re in an affordability crisis because workers aren’t being paid at the same levels they earned in the past.
The post The $79 Trillion Heist appeared first on The American Prospect.
content:
This article appears in the December 2025 issue of The American Prospect magazine.Subscribe here.
